name: Pro Tools Controller Plug-in Mappings File

screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .pim file in PIM
screenshot.caption: PIM file open in PIM

description: Developer Ilia Muraviev released PIM in 2004. PIM's proprietary compression format, which is referred to as both PIM and PIMPLE, is optimized for compressing multimedia files.

To create a PIM archive, users first select File → New... to create the archive. Then, they select Commands → Add File(s)... or Commands → Add Folder... to add files or folders to the archive. After a user has added files to a PIM archive, they cannot add more files to that archive.

common_filenames.description: NewArchive.pim - The default name PIM assigns to PIM files.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .pim file in PIM
images.caption: PIM file open in PIM
